text:
Kashturi is professional, helpful and kind. She made my banking experience with UOB
very pleasant. My faith in UOB is further reinforced by her excellent service and great attitude. This lady is a great asset to your bank. Keep it up üëçüëç

A big thank you to Kelly Foo from UOB for her exceptional service! She was incredibly professional and patient throughout the process, always greeting me with a smile and taking the time to answer all my questions in detail. Kelly also went the extra mile to help me navigate some of the more complex steps, making the whole experience smooth and stress-free. I‚Äôm very impressed with the service and truly appreciate her help.

Kashturi , is very patient. Beyond my expectation. Very knowledgeable and very helpful.
A very valuable staff. Thank you UOB for having such great staff.
I would also like to compliment Ms Angela Law. Wonderful staff. Bravo.
Thank you again. All very patient

Kashturi
She is efficient, polite ,courteous and very helpful.
Good works, keep it up.
Thanks
Have a great day

Ms. Kashturi over at the entrance of the bank was so lovely and hospitable. I never met anyone who gives a better service than her. First, i was served almost immediately. There was one customer ahead of me but she told me to have a seat first and served me immediately after. She is soft spoken and patient and very kind with her words. My issue was resolved swiftly and without any hiccups. She definitely also went the extra mile to update additional things that will help my self service banking needs in the future. Very thoughtful on her side. I am glad she puts herself in customer shoes in order to understand the needs of her customers. Although the interaction was short, the impact was huge. Many props to her for being the face of UOB VivoCity! Keep it up Ms. Kashturi.
